name: The Forbidden Web
description:
Welcome to The Forbidden Web. This is a 2d side-scroller where you, playing as a spider, will have to get through each level while trying to collect all 50 coins per level. If you manage to get all the coins in a world you will get to hear a bonus soundtrack in the main menu. Fair warning though, getting all the coins in each level is not an easy task.

So far two worlds are finished out of however many worlds I make so think of this as a free trial of the full game. The game has a built in autosave so don't worry about losing progress. 

All the sprites, sound effects, soundtracks, characters, and everything else was made solely by me, with the help of Unreal Engine, Pixilart, and Garage Band.

This game is currently completely free to download.
